experience.title: experience
experience.description:
About me

I'm a Software Developer with over 10 years of experience in various domains, specializing in the last 3 years in native iOS development using Swift, SwiftUI, and Xcode. I have a strong background in building high-quality, intuitive mobile applications for Apple devices.

Prior to focusing on iOS, I gained extensive experience in a variety of software development areas:

Game Development: Proficient with Unity3D and Roblox for creating cross-platform video games.

Full-Stack Web and Desktop Development: Experienced in building web and desktop applications using ASP.NET MVC, WPF, and Bootstrap.

Backend & API Development: Strong background in designing and integrating RESTful web services.

Database Management: Skilled in managing both SQL Server and MongoDB databases.

With a passion for crafting clean and efficient code, I am always eager to take on new challenges and grow as a developer.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me

I'm a passionate Mobile Engineer with over 3 years of experience in native iOS development using Swift, SwiftUI, and Xcode. I specialize in building high-quality, intuitive mobile applications for Apple devices, focusing on delivering seamless user experiences and leveraging the latest iOS frameworks.
In addition to my expertise in iOS, I have a diverse background in software development across multiple platforms:

Game Development: Proficient with Unity3D for creating cross-platform video games.

Full-Stack Web and Desktop Development: Experienced in building web and desktop applications using ASP.NET MVC, WPF, and Bootstrap.

Backend & API Development: Strong background in designing and integrating RESTful web services.

Database Management: Skilled in managing both SQL Server and MongoDB databases.
